Name: VITATIO
About the game: VITATIO is the latin word for avoidance and is the exact premise of this game, avoid collisions with opposing gems and guide your way to the highest score on the global leaderboards! ★ DIFFICULT GAMEPLAY! Ridiculously hard at later levels, you will need to train your reaction speed and cunning to become the highest scorer ★ TRAIN YOUR REFLEXES! VITATIO is a game that favours the strong minded, it will test your patience and every time you lose, you are becoming better! ★ ACHIEVEMENTS! Over 40 achievements for you to unlock! ★ GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS! Do you have the fastest and best reflexes in the world? then prove it!
Meta Title: VITATIO: Jul 28, 2017, ColloseusX and Full Overview
